fields.name: collection
fields.label: Collection
fields.description: The collection to get the items from

fields.name: isVertical
fields.label: Vertical Direction
fields.description: Display slides in a vertical orientation.

fields.name: containerHeight
fields.label: Container Height (for Vertical)
fields.description: Set the height of the carousel container in pixels (e.g., 400). Required for vertical direction.

fields.name: containerMaxWidth
fields.label: Container Max Width
fields.description: Set the width of the slide. 600px is recommended for CUBE effect.

fields.name: numberOfSlides
fields.label: Number of Slides per View
fields.description: Specify how many slides should be visible at once.

fields.name: centeredSlides
fields.label: Centered Slides
fields.description: If true, the active slide will be centered, not always on the left.

fields.name: spaceBetween
fields.label: Space Between Slides
fields.description: Specify the space (in px) between slides.

fields.name: showScrollbar
fields.label: Show Scrollbar
fields.description: Display a scrollbar for the carousel.

fields.name: loop
fields.label: Infinite Loop
fields.description: Enable continuous loop mode for the carousel.

fields.name: showPagination
fields.label: Show Pagination (Dots)
fields.description: Display the pagination dots at the bottom.

fields.name: swiperPagBottom
fields.label: Distance of Pagination from bottom
fields.description: Specify the space between bottom and slides.

fields.name: navColor
fields.label: Navigation Color
fields.description: Set the color for the next/previous arrows.

fields.name: paginationColor
fields.label: Pagination Color
fields.description: Set the color for the pagination dots.

fields.name: carouselEffect
fields.label: Carousel Effect
fields.description: Select the transition effect for the carousel.
